text: The only time you should ever look back, is to see how far you've come.
author: Bangtan Boys, Butterfly

text: Life is a sculpture that you cast as you make mistakes and learn from them.
author: Kim Namjoon

text: I hope you know your limits well, but donâ€™t stay within those limits. Overcome the limits each day.
author: Kim Namjoon

text: If any of you feels lost in the face of uncertainty or the pressure of starting anew, don't rush. Take a deep breath. You may find that any moment can be turned into opportunity.
author: Kim Seokjin

text: Those who keep trying without giving up are the ones who succeed.
author: Kim Seokjin

text: When something is delicious. It's zero calories.
author: Kim Seokjin

text: Life is tough, and things don't always work out well, but we should be brave and go on with our lives.
author: Min Yoongi

text: Don't be trapped in someone else's dream.
author: Kim Taehyung

text: When things get hard, stop for awhile and look back and see how far you've come. Don't forget how rewarding it is.
author: Kim Taehyung

text: Forget what hurt you, but never forget what it taught you.
author: Kim Taehyung

text: Trust is like a paper. When it crumbles, it will never be perfect again.
author: Kim Taehyung

text: No matter how hard it is right now, think of what the result will make you feel.
author: Park Jimin

text: Never give up on a dream that you've been crashing almost your whole life.
author: Park Jimin

text: Life isn't about being perfect, it's about accomplishing your dreams.
author: Jeon Jungkook

text: Effort makes you. You will regret someday if you don't do your best now.
author: Jeon Jungkook

text: Don't think it's too late to keep working on it. It may take time, but there's nothing that gets worse due to practising.
author: Jeon Jungkook

text: All our dreams come true, if we have the courage to persue them.
author: Jeon Jungkook
